fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We captioned a picture as showing Lincolnshire’s Woodhall Spa golf course. It was actually of Wallasey golf club, which is on the Wirral peninsula (Made in Lincolnshire, 12 May, page 35, Review). • A feature misplaced the Cornish town of Wadebridge in the neighbouring county of Devon (Schools pulled into row over helping transgender children, 15 May, page 32).
